description.oldValue:
The new Caption Settings pane allows for better discovery and easier navigation. Users have the ability to customize the size and color of their font as well as the height and position of the caption window with the option to scroll to review captions of what has been said, up to one minute ago.
GA date: May CY2023
description.newValue:
The new Caption Settings pane allows for better
discovery and easier navigation. Users have the ability to customize the size
and color of their font as well as the height and position of the caption
window with the option to scroll to review captions of what has been said, up
to one minute ago.
